ygData.subject: Quest Submission -- off topic
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the GM s gave me an e-mail address that he said we could use to submit quest ideas.  It sounded like he wanted full blown stories and all. It would
ygData.messageBody:
One of the GM's gave me an e-mail address that he said we could use to
submit quest ideas. It sounded like he wanted full blown stories and all.
It would prolly make their jobs easier to have players do it for them. His
address is jellis@.... He said he would delete without reading
anything that has nothing to do with quests, including buggy quests. I
think he wanted things as detailed as possible if you wanted to submit them.
I know this is off-topic. I apologize, but reading the posts about the
server emulator (which would be awesome) and the original quests reminded
me.
